name: Acid Cloud
description:
Game for GMTK Game Jam 2019. Not very tied in with the theme but I struggled to come up with anything. First time doing a game jam by myself and first time doing the programming. Not the most amazing game ever but I learnt a lot and had fun doing it.

What is the game? -- You control a... bucket?? Idk. You move around and pick up the water as it drops from the very rectangular cloud. If one litre of acid touches the ground you loose, you can score points by neutralising the acid in your bucket.

CONTROLS:

Left and Right Shifts for movement

Hold space bar to neutralize acid.

Hope someone finds it fun. :)))
